p: Thirty‐six male albino Wistar rats weighing 250 ± 30 g were supplied by the animal house of the Mashhad University of Medical Sciences. The animals were housed in a room with a 21 ± 2°C temperature and 12 hr light/dark cycle. All experimental procedures were in accordance with the guidelines approved by the Committee on Animal Research of Mashhad University of Medical Sciences, and the protocol and procedures employed were approved by the Research Ethical Committee of the Mashhad University of Medical Sciences (IR.MUMS.MEDICAL.REC.1398.202).
